FuncDef: This command configures a private IPv4 or IPv6 address of the remote tunnel endpoint. A tunnel can have up to 16dest-ipcommands. At least onedest-ipaddress is required in the configuration of a tunnel. A tunnel does not come up operationally unless alldest-ipaddresses are reachable (part of a local subnet).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination IPv4 or IPv6 address.
